channel.title: NPC Coding
channel.description: I was wondering, how do you code an NPC to where when you click on the NPC it will give you money. I was gonna make this for the Donators Island..also, how do you make the thieving stalls give you more money based on your rank as a player?

item.title: NPC Coding
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

aciraccar:

lol why would you want a player to get free coins every click if there a donator obv itl be abused and theyl make bots for it

This doesn’t concern you…He can do whatever he wants with his server. You don’t even know if he is making it for that…What if he’s just asking it because he wants to learn? Ever though about that? Next time don’t post unless you have some kind of advice or your answering the question that’s being asked.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Coding
item.dc:creator: @aciraccar aciraccar
item.description:
@aciraccar wrote:

lol why would you want a player to get free coins every click if there a donator obv itl be abused and theyl make bots for it

item.title: NPC Coding
item.dc:creator: @Host_Gushers Host Gushers
item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“Fire capez, post:4, topic:477631”]You didn’t specify as to what source you’re using so this question is pretty much impossible for me to answer; for all I know you could be using allstarscape.

The only accurate answer I can give you is that for obtaining money when clicking on an npc you should look at the npc clicking packets (first and second click) and for the thieving stalls you should look into your object clicking packets (first and second click)

Try searching for the object and npc ids independently and see if you find anything.[/quote]

It doesnt matter about what source he is using…We know that he is using a 317 and most of them are the same…We just need to give him a general idea. He should be able to do the rest on his own.

case ###:
if (c.isdonator >= 2);
c.getItems().addItem(995, 100000);
break;

That is what it should look like.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Coding
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

You didn’t specify as to what source you’re using so this question is pretty much impossible for me to answer; for all I know you could be using allstarscape.

The only accurate answer I can give you is that for obtaining money when clicking on an npc you should look at the npc clicking packets (first and second click) and for the thieving stalls you should look into your object clicking packets (first and second click)

Try searching for the object and npc ids independently and see if you find anything.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC Coding
item.dc:creator: @h2k h2k
item.description:
@h2k wrote:

for the npc part,
in actionhandle, add something like

case ###: if (c.isdonator >= 2); c.getItems().addItem(995, 100000); break;
edit everything with your ranks now

Read full topic
